channel.title: CVE Feed for Android -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Android -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-1998|2024-08-04T18:35:52.426Z -- android -- android
item.description: In event_handler of keymaster_app.c, there is possible resource exhaustion due to a table being lost on reboot. This could lead to local denial of service that is not fixed by a factory reset, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-9. Android ID: A-116055338.

item.title: CVE-2019-1995|2024-08-04T18:35:52.458Z -- android -- android
item.description: In ComposeActivityEmail of ComposeActivityEmail.java, there is a possible way to silently attach files to an email due to a confused deputy. This could lead to local information disclosure, sending files accessible to AOSP Mail to a remote email recipient, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-32589229.

item.title: CVE-2019-2037|2024-08-04T18:35:52.468Z -- android -- android
item.description: In l2cu_send_peer_config_rej of l2c_utils.cc, there is a possible out-of-bound read due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-119870451.

item.title: CVE-2019-2029|2024-08-04T18:35:52.546Z -- android -- android
item.description: In btm_proc_smp_cback of tm_ble.cc, there is a possible memory corruption due to a use after free. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-120612744.

item.title: CVE-2019-1999|2024-08-04T18:35:52.476Z -- android -- android
item.description: In binder_alloc_free_page of binder_alloc.c, there is a possible double free due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege in the kernel with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-120025196.

item.title: CVE-2019-1986|2024-08-04T18:35:52.389Z -- android -- android
item.description: In SkSwizzler::onSetSampleX of SkSwizzler.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote escalation of privilege in system_server with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-9. Android ID: A-117838472.

item.title: CVE-2019-2030|2024-08-04T18:35:52.413Z -- android -- android
item.description: In removeInterfaceAddress of NetworkController.cpp, there is a possible use after free. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-9. Android ID: A-119496789.

item.title: CVE-2019-2027|2024-08-04T18:35:52.455Z -- android -- android
item.description: In floor0_inverse1 of floor0.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-119120561.

item.title: CVE-2019-1997|2024-08-04T18:35:52.416Z -- android -- android
item.description: In random_get_bytes of random.c, there is a possible degradation of randomness due to an insecure default value. This could lead to local information disclosure via an insecure wireless connection with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-117508900.

item.title: CVE-2019-1992|2024-08-04T18:35:52.448Z -- android -- android
item.description: In bta_hl_sdp_query_results of bta_hl_main.cc, there is a possible use-after-free due to a race condition. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-116222069.

item.title: CVE-2019-2028|2024-08-04T18:35:52.469Z -- android -- android
item.description: In numerous hand-crafted functions in libmpeg2, NEON registers are not preserved. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-120644655.

item.title: CVE-2019-1988|2024-08-04T18:35:52.370Z -- android -- android
item.description: In sample6 of SkSwizzler.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to improper input validation. This could lead to remote code execution in system_server with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-118372692.

item.title: CVE-2019-2001|2024-08-04T18:35:52.391Z -- android -- android
item.description: The permissions on /proc/iomem were world-readable. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-117422211.

item.title: CVE-2019-2097|2024-08-04T18:42:49.859Z -- android -- android
item.description: In HAliasAnalyzer.Query of hydrogen-alias-analysis.h, there is possible memory corruption due to type confusion. This could lead to remote code execution from a malicious proxy configuration, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-117606285.

item.title: CVE-2019-2102|2024-08-04T18:42:50.123Z -- android -- android
item.description: In the Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) specification, there is a provided example Long Term Key (LTK). If a BLE device were to use this as a hardcoded LTK, it is theoretically possible for a proximate attacker to remotely inject keystrokes on a paired Android host due to improperly used crypto. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-128843052.

item.title: CVE-2019-2091|2024-08-04T18:42:50.429Z -- android -- android
item.description: In GetPermittedAccessibilityServicesForUser of DevicePolicyManagerService.java, there is a possible permissions bypass due to a missing permission check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege, with no additional permissions required. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1. Android ID: A-128599660.

item.title: CVE-2019-1994|2024-08-04T18:35:52.444Z -- android -- android
item.description: In refresh of DevelopmentTiles.java, there is the possibility of leaving development settings accessible due to an insecure default value. This could lead to unwanted access to development settings, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-117770924.

item.title: CVE-2019-2034|2024-08-04T18:35:52.428Z -- android -- android

Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-122035770.

item.title: CVE-2024-7014|2024-07-30T03:55:38.806Z -- android -- telegram%20for%20android
